title: It’s a ‘Bachelor Live on Stage’ Takeover!
description:
On this very special edition of “Bachelor Happy Hour,” Becca is joined by the men of “The Bachelor Live on Stage” to discuss all the exciting things waiting for them as the show heads back out on tour! 

James Bonsall (season 17), Rick Leach (season 18), Connor Brennan (season 17), Ivan Hall (season 16), Justin Glaze (season 17), Andrew Spencer (season 17), and Rodney Mathews (season 18) all reveal what cities they will be joining Becca in, what moves will automatically earn their rose, and how they plan to bring something unique to their run as Becca’s co-host! Plus, Becca finds out which guys are ready for some kisses and shares her best advice for anyone who competes for a rose during “The Bachelor Live on Stage.”  

To purchase tickets for shows in a city near you, make sure to head to BachelorLiveOnStage.com. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
